titleStmt.title: D. W. Lindsey, Special Orders, No. 76
CWG13637

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Active Militia Records - Capital Guards, North Cumberland Btn., and Three Forks Btn.
msIdentifier.idno: Box 77, Folder 865 NORTH CUMBERLAND BN CO B KSG SPECIAL ORDERS

body.p:
Headquarters Kentucky Volunteers,
Adjutant=General's Office,
Frankfort, Sep 6, 1865.
Special Orders
No 76 }
Lt H L Keesel of Co B North ion will be mustered out as 1s Lt to date the 19 of m to complete his record.

And whereas there is an incomplete muster of the following named officers on file in this office, made by Maj C. W. Quiggins Special Mustering officer for the State, Lt C Haydon State Mustering officer is hereby directed to muster them in, in their respective grades, as of the date set opposite their names

It appearing from proper information that they have performed the duties as such, by proper authority from the dates mentioned. viz
H. L, Keesel Capt Co B to date 20 March 1865
Douglas Imes 1st Lt (Vice K pro) " 20 " "
Jno L. Lamb 2nd Lt " 20 " "

By order of the Govenor
D. W. Lindsey
adj Genl of Ky
